sentences.sContent: A hospital chief executive has quashed rumours that people will lose their jobs.
sentences.sCn: 医院院长已澄清了员工将失业的谣言。

sentences.sContent: The government immediately moved to quash the revolt.
sentences.sCn: 政府立即采取行动平定叛乱。

synos.tran: 撤销；镇压；宣布无效；捣碎

remMethod.val: qu + ash(灰) → 使成灰 → 平息

trans.tranCn: 撤销， 废止； 镇压； 平息
trans.tranOther: to say or do something to stop something from continuing
